entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 10:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -35.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -39.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
